oxidized silver chain 50cm


"CACTUS" CRYSTAL

In addition to providing equilibrium, this radiant stone purifies the air in its surroundings. It can also help to recover from serious fatigue.
The surface of the cactus is iridescent. It breaks the light into rainbow colours: an effective tool to refocus, recover and repair the aura.
Its vertical shape supports a large protective radiation range inside the house.

name: necklace KILA
description:
bandits by sarah tari

pendant: brass/rose gold, oxidized silver 925 or silver 925
chain: oxidized silver 60cm


The phurba is a symbol of stability and it is also known as the magic dagger.

The blade is composed of three triangular facets, meeting at the tip. These represent the blade's power to transform the negative energies known as the "three poisons": 
attachment - craving - desire, 
delusion - ignorance - misconception and 
aversion - fear - hate.

The three sides of the phurba also represent the three spirit worlds, the phurba itself represents the axis and the center brings the three spirit worlds together. 

The phurba may be employed to hold demons in place and may serve to bind and pin down negative energies or obscurations from the mindstream of an entity, person or thoughtform, to administer purification.

name: necklace PENDEL
description:
bandits by sarah tari

quartz, cavansite
oxidized silver chain 70cm


QUARTZ
Called  rock crystal  clear quartz. It is at the same time a receiver, a transmitter, processor and energetic amplifier.
Its applications are diverse. Excellent to stimulate circulation and remove all energy blockages.

Bring a rock crystal intensifies the influence of our aura.

The rock crystal embodies the perfection of the material world, aligned and connected to the cosmic form. (K.Raphaell)


CAVANSITE
Mineral that inspires in us the spiritual being.

It promotes channeling, developing our inner vision and fills the mind with positive thoughts.

Stone of spiritual elevation.

name: necklace BLACK TIME
description:
bandits by sarah tari

oxidized silver or black brass
oxidized silver chain 80 cm


BANDITS BY SARAH TARI Black Collection is inspired by the Berlin Iron Jewellery of the 19th Century. All citizens were urged to contribute their gold and silver jewellery during the War of Liberation. In return the people were given iron jewellery, often with the inscription "Gold gab ich fr Eisen" (I gave gold for iron). Until then iron jewellery had only been worn as a symbol of mourning because of its black colour.

name: OnePiece #02
description:
bandits by sarah tari

top 100% wool
OnePiece cutting method

BANDITS BY SARAH TARI OnePiece presents garments made out of one singular piece.
Sarah Tariverdian developed the concept for this unique pattern cutting process in 2003.
After an extensive design phase, working with styles and shapes and further developing this new pattern cutting process, she decided to create a small collection of her work.
Each garment has only one continuously running seam encircling the body - similar to peeling an apple in one piece.
Materials such as jersey, cotton and wool - combined with this unique pattern cutting process - ensure a completely new joy of wearing.

BANDITS BY SARAH TARI OnePiece garments are available upon request.
